data.message: I post alot of things I hear in the car on the radio I only get out a very little bit.  But that seems to be the magic time for random music for some reason.

replies.message: I don't remember listening to music in my room or having music equipment... I just remember it in the car and then on mtv when that became big... I remember writing in my room alone or places outside.... before sitting in my room and listening to music... that didn't happen until I was a teenager really that I took a big interest in music cause I was outside a ton as a kid... while our mom was at "work" whatever that means looking back now...sometimes this how you create your own beat and rhythms is in your own silence.
Hey you should ask everyone to contribute music or favorite music as inspiration to one song you are gonna make from it. Or lyrics regarding a subject.
